name: @nkzw/use-relative-time
author: Christoph Nakazawa <christoph.pojer@gmail.com>
description: A zero-dependency React hook for formatting relative dates.

scripts.build: mkdir -p lib && rm -rf lib/*; tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --noEmit false && mv lib/src/*.d.ts lib/ && rmdir lib/src && rm -rf lib/test && prettier --ignore-path '' --write lib/use-relative-time.d.ts && esbuild --target=es2017 --format=esm --outfile=lib/use-relative-time.js --external:react --bundle ./src/use-relative-time.tsx
